thread.title: Browns rise in ranks after beating Jaguars
thread.title_full: Browns rise in ranks after beating Jaguars

author: Browns Alchemy
title: Browns rise in ranks after beating Jaguars
text:
The Cleveland Browns bounced back in Week 2 against the Jacksonville Jaguars. The offense looked more competent this week, and the defense shut down a potent Jaguars passing attack. The Browns played well last week, and much better than in their debut. The stats are starting to reveal how good the Browns are.
It must be stated that there‚Äôs nothing more important in data analytics than a large sample size. Football is considered a small sample size sport due to the lack of games compared to the other major sports leagues worldwide. Most football analytic experts believe teams need to play four to six games before we can identify trends.
Fans should appreciate the outliers in the data instead of reading the tea leaves. For example, the best two defenses in expected points added have both played the Carolina Panthers, who benched former number-one pick Bryce Young earlier this week. It‚Äôs important to keep stats in perspective during the early phases of the season.
NFL Tiers based on EPA ~~ Week 2 NFL Thread ~~
The Bills are good and the Panthers are not
(asterisk for the Chargers/Saints because they played the Panthers)
Look at Washington‚Äôs offense! pic.twitter.com/k0SjFeiAfj
‚Äî Computer Cowboy (@benbbaldwin) September 17, 2024
The Browns are hiding behind the Titans and Raiders on the line separating the second and third worse tiers. Series Results How hard it is to move the ball against each defense
(‚Äúplayed the Panthers‚Äù applies to Chargers/Saints here and ‚Äúplayed the Broncos‚Äù to Seahawks/Steelers) pic.twitter.com/YjJ6gd0BPa
‚Äî Computer Cowboy (@benbbaldwin) September 17, 2024
The Browns offense still failing to score points. Meanwhile, the Browns defense are one of the best at forcing teams to settle for field goals instead of touchdowns. QB Chart Quarterback grade and efficiency through Week 2
Malik Willis!
Not hard to guess who has been benched already pic.twitter.com/78l2OntGYX
‚Äî Computer Cowboy (@benbbaldwin) September 17, 2024
Pro Football Focus seem to think Deshaun Watson is playing much better than what his numbers indicate. Kevin Stefanski and the Browns are throwing the ball more than ever Pass rate on early downs when the game is close
Jim Harbaugh has been as advertised. Will be interesting to see how they do when they first have to play against a real team (KC week 4) pic.twitter.com/C5a89XQwYV
‚Äî Computer Cowboy (@benbbaldwin) September 17, 2024

The Cleveland Browns are still trying to figure out their run game.
